channel.title: Project 2006 | Iron Man Mode | 26 Fully Working Quests | 2006/2007 Remake
channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a5wjiCi.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=5]URL: [url=http://project2006.com]Project 2006[/url] - ONLINE Since September 2014[/SIZE][/B]
[u][center][b]Links:[/b][/center] [b]World 1 (Normal Mode) [/b]- http://project2006.com/client.jar [b]World 2 (Iron Man Mode)[/b] - http://project2006.com/iron/client.jar [b] Highscores[/b] - http://project2006.com/highscores [b] Forums[/b] - http://project2006.com/forum
[U][B]What items are there in iron man mode?[/B][/U] [B][I]All 2006 items have been added, clues are working - and the best reward you could get is 3rd-Age, Dragon fire shield is added to certain drops such as King Black Dragon, Skeletal Wyverns, Black Dragons. - Trident of the sea is still in progress and will be added very soon! [U][B]What is the Exp Rate on Iron man mode?[/B][/U] [I][B]The experience rate for Project 2006 is 15x the Runescape's Original rate.[/B][/I]
[U][B]What is Iron Man Mode?[/B][/CENTER] [B][I]Iron man mode is the second mode in Project 2006, it is known to be hard as there are certain restrictions - such as the restrictions of trading one another, some shops won't work for you as it is iron man mode.
[b]Ironman rules/limitations[/b]
- No trading other players - No picking up drops from other players (including PvP drops) - No PvP XP (spell casting experience, splashing, is still gained) - Nightmare zone is still in progress, however when completed players can only use solo nightmare zone and the shop will not sell you resources.
[b]Ironman Highscores[/b] There are two different highscores, one for the main world, and the other for iron man mode. This will be a great way to see who the best of the best are. If you no longer wish to go on as an ironman and convert to a standard account, your efforts as an ironman will not be lost.
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/oNhVqF0.png[/img][/center]
[b]Skillcapes[/b]
Skillcapes are a great way to show off your self to other players in game, once a player reaches a 99 they will have the ability to purchase a skillcape from Wise Old man in draynor village.
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/bixry8K.png[/img][/center]
[b]Dragonfire Shield[/b]
Even though this is a 2006 remake, to make dragons more motivating to kill, we decided to add in dragonfire shield - this shield will require the draconic visage just like normal RuneScape to combine to an anti-fire shield and it will also require 90 smithing or above.
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/8gbDJSq.png[/img][/center]
[b]Fighter Torso[/b]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/f8l33iv.png[/img][/center]
Fighter torso is added to the game, this was released on the 4th January 2007 in RuneScape, but it is a really good item for the iron man's to enjoy.
[b] Ava's Accumulator [/b]
Ava's accumulator is fully working, and restores your arrows when they get hit, this is really good for iron men.
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/uhVvXoR.png[/img][/center]
[b]Quests[/b]
At Project 2006, we release regular quests, and our current working quests are shown below - these have been tested to a fully working state.
- Black Knight's Fort - Cooks Assistant - Demon Slayer - Doric's Quest - Dragon slayer - Goblin diplomacy - Imp Catcher - Knights sword - Pirate Treasure - Restless Ghost - Romeo and Juliet - Rune Mysteries - Sheep Shearer - Shield of Arrav (not on ironman mode, but it is 100% added.) - Vampire Slayer - Witch's Potion - Druidic Ritual - Fishing Contest - The Grand tree - Lost city - Monkey Madness - Monk's friend - Priest in peril - Sheep herder - Tree gnome village - Witch's House
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/i0oS5j8.png[/img][/center]
[b]Clues[/b]
Clues have been added to certain NPC's, and are pretty awarding, you can get anything from coins to 3rd Age!
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/tJqdVEl.png[/img][/center]
[b]Drops[/b]
The drop system is pretty similar to the oldschool system.
[b]Donating Perks[/b] We have only added benefits, which will not ruin the play to win feel, this is in no case a "pay" to win. - sleight of hand $5- get caught 20% less - master chef $5- burn fish 20% less - master farmer $5- 20% chance of crop not getting diseased or dieing - rings of life $15- all rings that have charges are now unlimited. - runecraft madness $5- runecrafting pouches don't degrade - bird man $5- 30% better chance at getting a birds nest - miner miner $5 chance at receiving double ores
Project 2006 has always and will always be a community based game, therefore we want your opinions on what the iron man mode is going to be like, we hope to see you soon in game!
[u][center][b]Links:[/b][/center] [b]World 1 (Normal Mode) [/b]- http://project2006.com/client.jar [b]World 2 (Iron Man Mode)[/b] - http://project2006.com/iron/client.jar [b] Highscores[/b] - http://project2006.com/highscores [b] Forums[/b] - http://project2006.com/forum

item.title: Project 2006 | Iron Man Mode | 26 Fully Working Quests | 2006/2007 Remake
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:7, topic:550202”]Last time I played one of your servers, you barely gave a shit about the players.
But that’s last time…
Good luck I guess[/quote]

Thanks, this does get daily updates, so I think I have changed since then haha

Read full topic

Are you going to be releasing anymore of your work?[/quote]

@briney21 wrote:

so many quests for a rsps which is great and i love how its not just another arios leech. this server has had creativity put into it and i can tell there is going to be alot of big updates and content added A++ to the owner of this server and i would definately reccomend giving this a shot!

item.title: Project 2006 | Iron Man Mode | 26 Fully Working Quests | 2006/2007 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Should add your forum link to the links section of the thread. And interesting little donator benefits, I don’t think it should be based on each little thing though. You should make it for all subscribers but either or, it’s not a big deal. It’s a lot better of features for a donation option than other communities I’ve seen, and it works well for this base of a server.

Either or, I’m not interested because of other communities I’ve seen that’s been doing this a lot longer but I do wish for the best of luck. It does look promising, I will admit that much but I’m not interested in grinding something else other than OSRS itself.

Read full topic
item.source: Project 2006 | Iron Man Mode | 26 Fully Working Quests | 2006/2007 Remake

item.title: Project 2006 | Iron Man Mode | 26 Fully Working Quests | 2006/2007 Remake
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

[CENTER][CENTER]

[B][SIZE=5]URL: Project 2006 - ONLINE Since September 2014[/SIZE][/B]

[u][center]Links:[/center]
World 1 (Normal Mode) - http://project2006.com/client.jar
World 2 (Iron Man Mode) - http://project2006.com/iron/client.jar

Highscores - http://project2006.com/highscores

Forums - http://project2006.com/forum

[U][B]What items are there in iron man mode?[/B][/U]
[B][I]All 2006 items have been added, clues are working - and the best reward you could get is 3rd-Age, Dragon fire shield is added to certain drops such as King Black Dragon, Skeletal Wyverns, Black Dragons. - Trident of the sea is still in progress and will be added very soon!
[U][B]What is the Exp Rate on Iron man mode?[/B][/U]
[I][B]The experience rate for Project 2006 is 15x the Runescape’s Original rate.[/B][/I]

[U][B]What is Iron Man Mode?[/B][/CENTER]
[B][I]Iron man mode is the second mode in Project 2006, it is known to be hard as there are certain restrictions - such as the restrictions of trading one another, some shops won’t work for you as it is iron man mode.

Ironman rules/limitations

  • No trading other players
  • No picking up drops from other players (including PvP drops)
  • No PvP XP (spell casting experience, splashing, is still gained)
  • Nightmare zone is still in progress, however when completed players can only use solo nightmare zone and the shop will not sell you resources.

Ironman Highscores
There are two different highscores, one for the main world, and the other for iron man mode.
This will be a great way to see who the best of the best are. If you no longer wish to go on as an ironman and convert to a standard account, your efforts as an ironman will not be lost.

[center][/center]

Skillcapes

Skillcapes are a great way to show off your self to other players in game, once a player reaches a 99 they will have the ability to purchase a skillcape from Wise Old man in draynor village.

[center][/center]

Dragonfire Shield

Even though this is a 2006 remake, to make dragons more motivating to kill, we decided to add in dragonfire shield - this shield will require the draconic visage just like normal RuneScape to combine to an anti-fire shield and it will also require 90 smithing or above.

[center][/center]

Fighter Torso

[center][/center]

Fighter torso is added to the game, this was released on the 4th January 2007 in RuneScape, but it is a really good item for the iron man’s to enjoy.

Ava’s Accumulator

Ava’s accumulator is fully working, and restores your arrows when they get hit, this is really good for iron men.

[center][/center]

Quests

At Project 2006, we release regular quests, and our current working quests are shown below - these have been tested to a fully working state.

  • Black Knight’s Fort
  • Cooks Assistant
  • Demon Slayer
  • Doric’s Quest
  • Dragon slayer
  • Goblin diplomacy
  • Imp Catcher
  • Knights sword
  • Pirate Treasure
  • Restless Ghost
  • Romeo and Juliet
  • Rune Mysteries
  • Sheep Shearer
  • Shield of Arrav (not on ironman mode, but it is 100% added.)
  • Vampire Slayer
  • Witch’s Potion
  • Druidic Ritual
  • Fishing Contest
  • The Grand tree
  • Lost city
  • Monkey Madness
  • Monk’s friend
  • Priest in peril
  • Sheep herder
  • Tree gnome village
  • Witch’s House

[center][/center]

Clues

Clues have been added to certain NPC’s, and are pretty awarding, you can get anything from coins to 3rd Age!

[center][/center]

Drops

The drop system is pretty similar to the oldschool system.

Donating Perks
We have only added benefits, which will not ruin the play to win feel, this is in no case a “pay” to win.

  • sleight of hand $5- get caught 20% less
  • master chef $5- burn fish 20% less
  • master farmer $5- 20% chance of crop not getting diseased or dieing
  • rings of life $15- all rings that have charges are now unlimited.
  • runecraft madness $5- runecrafting pouches don’t degrade
  • bird man $5- 30% better chance at getting a birds nest
  • miner miner $5 chance at receiving double ores

Project 2006 has always and will always be a community based game, therefore we want your opinions on what the iron man mode is going to be like, we hope to see you soon in game!

[u][center]Links:[/center]
World 1 (Normal Mode) - http://project2006.com/client.jar
World 2 (Iron Man Mode) - http://project2006.com/iron/client.jar

Highscores - http://project2006.com/highscores

Forums - http://project2006.com/forum
